value:
$WmMPID_ハロカムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_Halloween22,Face|So, this is Askr's harvest festival?
I like it! Everyone seems to be
having a wonderful time.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカムイ男,ch05_00_Kamui_M_Halloween22,Face|I once took part in a similar festival in
Nohr. The motifs are a little different,
but the costumes are just as flashy.$k$pIt's interesting to see what people
from other worlds come up with.
Hang on... Do you hear that?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_Halloween22,Face|Sounds like a flute. I wonder who the
player could be. Hmm, it seems to be
coming from this way...$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_ハロニルス,ch03_28_Nils_M_Halloween22,Face|$Fi1500|...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカムイ男,ch05_00_Kamui_M_Halloween22,Face|Looks like we found our flute player.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロニルス,ch03_28_Nils_M_Halloween22,Face|Oh... Hello.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_Halloween22,Face|You're a very talented musician, Nils.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカムイ男,ch05_00_Kamui_M_Halloween22,Face|How come no one's here to listen?
A gifted performance like this
deserves an audience.$k$pThere's a festival going on right now.
I'll bet if you took the stage, listeners
would come running.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロニルス,ch03_28_Nils_M_Halloween22,Face|Maybe they would. I'm not interested
in that, though.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_Halloween22,Face|Really? I'm surprised. As I recall, you
were never shy about performing
during your travels...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロニルス,ch03_28_Nils_M_Halloween22,Face|I guess. It wasn't all fun and games
back then either, though. We had
our share of problems.$k$pTo tell you the truth, even though
I've met plenty of nice people, I'm
still uncomfortable around humans.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカムイ男,ch05_00_Kamui_M_Halloween22,Face|I understand where you're coming
from. It is a shame, though.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_Halloween22,Face|Agreed. We should all be comfortable
enjoying the harvest festival, dragons
and humans alike.$k$pIf there's anything we can do to help,
Nils, just say the word.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカムイ男,ch05_00_Kamui_M_Halloween22,Face|I have an idea. If you're not ready for
a human audience, why don't we
gather up some dragons?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロニルス,ch03_28_Nils_M_Halloween22,Face|I...guess that would be fine? I don't
know, I haven't met too many
other dragons.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカムイ男,ch05_00_Kamui_M_Halloween22,Face|There are tons of them participating
in the festival. You'll feel right at
home, I'm sure of it!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_Halloween22,Face|Sounds like a plan to me. All right,
let's go find some dragons.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロニルス,ch03_28_Nils_M_Halloween22,Face|OK, if you insist...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_比翼ドーマ,ch10_18_Duma_MF_Pair,Face|We procured this cache of sweets,
that we might vanquish any would-be
tricksters who approach us.$k$pYet it would appear that not a single
soul has dared. Is our mountain of
candy doomed to wither away?$k$p$nMPID_神階ミラ|I agree, it is most troubling.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカムイ男,ch05_00_Kamui_M_Halloween22,Face|Ah ha! Two dragons spotted. They
don't look too busy, either. I hope
they'll agree to come see Nils.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_比翼ドーマ,ch10_18_Duma_MF_Pair,Face|At last! Long have we awaited an
insidious trickster to repel with
the offer of delicious candy. Here!$k$p$nMPID_神階ミラ|Here, have a little extra. Truthfully,
we have a great surplus.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカムイ男,ch05_00_Kamui_M_Halloween22,Face|Uh, that's very nice, but I didn't come
here to trick-or-treat...$k$p$Sbs150|
